name: Galaxy Trespassers
description:
introduction 

Have you ever been tired of the classic game of space invaders yes? then introducing Galaxy Trespassers with all new lighting, rendering and landscape technology, this game will keep you hooked for the rest of your life. but you might say will this revolutionarily piece of software has to be for money then I say you are WRONG! this game is for free so play and enjoy.

How to play:

Stop the invaders from reaching your base by shooting them the American way and refuel so you that you can move and if the do reach then just heal the trash that forms when they touch.

controls

movement: W,A,S,D or arrow keys(recommended).

shooting: space

refuel: R

heal: E
